title: Tykr is the investing education and screening platform we all need, and it’s now under $100
content:
Macworld

With the new year comes new goals, and one of yours may include investing in the stock market more seriously. If you want to invest wisely, consider letting Tylr help you.

Tykr, a Trustpilot-approved stock screener and investment platform, can help budding and seasoned investors navigate the stock market. Through January 28, lifetime access to Tykr’s premium plan is only $99.97. Just enter code STOCK at checkout.

By analyzing over 30,000 U.S. and international stocks and categorizing them as buys, holds, or sells based on the stock’s score (aka financial strength), Tykr can make investing less intimidating. Investors can also learn to make smarter decisions with Tykr’s offering of financial statements, stock charts, and ratios and enjoy real-time alerts and updates on preferred stocks.

Users can also enjoy Tykr’s stock screener tool to filter stocks, a portfolio tracker to monitor their investments’ performance, and a community forum to communicate with other investors. In addition, you can learn how to manage investment risks with Tykr.

Arm yourself with guidance and tools from a trusted investment education and screening platform.

Get lifetime access to the Tykr Premium Plan for just $99.97 when you enter code STOCK at checkout. This offer ends January 28 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific.

 

Tykr Stock Screener Premium Plan Lifetime Subscription – $99.97
